<Text: The strip search phone call scam is a series of incidents that extended over a period of about ten years before an arrest was made in 2004.>

The strip search phone call scam
1:
--------------------
Text: Strip search phone call scam:  The incidents involved a man prank calling a restaurant or grocery store, claiming to be a police officer and then convincing managers to conduct strip searches of female employees, and to perform other bizarre acts on behalf of "the police".
Triplets:<phone call
2:
--------------------
Text: Strip search phone call scam:  The calls were most often placed to fast-food restaurants in small towns, located in rural areas of the United States.
